tool_description: Contains collections of geometric algorithms such as Minkovski, Polygon operations, Polygon Collision with Circle, Delaunay Triangulation, Voronoi Diagram, Polyline Simplification, and more.

api_list.name: Polygon Triangulation
api_list.description: Decompose a polygon into a set of triangles.

api_list.name: Rectangle Max Empty
api_list.description: Given a rectangle A and a set S of n points in A, find a largest-area rectangle which is contained in A, has its sides parallel to those of A, and does not contain any of the points in S.

api_list.name: Rectangle Packing
api_list.description: Given a bunch of rectangular objects which to pack into the smallest space possible.

api_list.name: Minkowski Diff
api_list.description: The Minkowski difference of two 2D shapes is the shape produced when subtracting every point on one shape from every point on the other shape.

api_list.name: Minkowski Sum
api_list.description: The Minkowski sum of two 2D shapes is formed by adding each point on one shape to each point in the other shape.

api_list.name: Polygon Outer Offset
api_list.description: Compute the offset region of a polygon by shifting the boundary outwards by a specified distance.

api_list.name: Polygon Inner Offset
api_list.description: Compute the offset region of a polygon by shifting the boundary inwards by a specified distance.

api_list.name: Polygon Partition
api_list.description: Decompose a polygon into a set of sub polygons such that the interiors of the sub polygons do not intersect and the union of the sub polygons is equal to the interior of the original polygon.

api_list.name: Polyline Simplification
api_list.description: Reduce the resolution of a polyline by removing vertices and edges, while maintaining a good approximation of the original curve.

api_list.name: Delaunay Triangulation
api_list.description: Given a point set, find the set of edges satisfying a property: for each edge we can find a circle containing the edge's endpoints but not containing any other points.

api_list.name: Voronoi Diagram
api_list.description: Given a collection of points, find a partition of space into cells, each of which consists of the points closer to one particular cell than to any others.

api_list.name: Largest Empty Circle
api_list.description: Find a circle of largest radius in the plane whose interior does not overlap with any given points.

api_list.name: Is Convex Polygon
api_list.description: Check if a polygon has all its interior angles less than 180Â°.
